Ethnicity.description: Ethnic background of the individual. Recommended is the use of a value from NCIT Race (NCIT:C17049) ontology term descendants, e.g. NCIT:C126531 (Latin American). A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent. [ NCI ]

GeographicLocation.description: Country or region of origin of the individual (birthplace or residence place regardless of ethnic origin). Value from GAZ Geographic Location ontology (GAZ:00000448), e.g. GAZ:00002459 (United States of America).

KaryotypicSex.description: The chromosomal sex of an individual represented from a selection of options. The values correspond to the ordinal values in the Phenopackets schema where: * 0 - UNKNOWN_KARYOTYPE (Untyped or inconclusive karyotyping) * 1 - XX (Female) * 2 - XY (Male) * 3 - XO (Single X chromosome only) * 4 - XXY (Two X and one Y chromosome) * 5 - XXX (Three X chromosomes) * 6 - XXYY (Two X chromosomes and two Y chromosomes) * 7 - XXXY (Three X chromosomes and one Y chromosome) * 8 - XXXX (Four X chromosomes) * 9 - XYY (One X and two Y chromosomes) * 10 - OTHER_KARYOTYPE (None of the above types)

SeverityLevel.description: Severity as applicable to phenotype or disease observed. Recommended are values from Human Phenotype Ontology (HP:0012824), e.g `mild`. The intensity or degree of a manifestation. Source: Phenopackets v2

Sex.description: Sex of the individual. Recommended values from NCIT General Qualifier (NCIT:C27993): "unknown" (not assessed or not available) - NCIT:C17998; "female" - NCIT:C16576;  "male" - NCIT:C20197

Timestamp.description: Time in date-time ISO8601 string format.

Unit.description: The kind of unit. Recommended from NCIT Unit of Category ontology term (NCIT:C42568) descendants

description: Definitions for concepts used in several entry types, but that having only one property are not complex enough to require a full independent schema document.
title: Common Definitions
